**Shopping with GetPaid**

This document assumes you have buyable content available on your
GetPaid site. If you don't, please read creating-buyable-content.txt

This document serves as a guide for an end user to use the GetPaid
shopping cart to buy items.

For now, please read the 'Add to Cart', 'Your Shopping Cart' and
'Checkout' sections of the following tutorial:

http://plone.org/products/getpaid/documentation/tutorial/to-use-getpaid
